electron_not_found: [error] Electron binary not found. Make sure you have run `npm i`.
howto_note: Note: This is safe & recommended for production. The --no-sandbox fallback is for development only.
sudo_prompt: [info] Running sudo in this terminal to fix chrome-sandbox (enter your password if prompted)...
disclaimerText:
This project is unofficial and not affiliated with, endorsed by, or connected to OpenAI in any way.
It was created because OpenAI does not provide an official ChatGPT desktop application for Linux.

All trademarks, product names, and company names or logos are the property of their respective owners.
Use of “ChatGPT” is for descriptive purposes only.
